item.description:
Meet Biagio at 12:45PM in the back classroom/cooking room so we can find each other, this place will get super supper packed fast, PLEASE DO NOT come LATE!!!! ...You wil have a hard time finidng me and the group, no joke! ....This is the GRAND wine tasting of the year with over 100 wines to taste!

Don't miss it last time ther were 100 wines throughout the store.

NOTE registration not required 21+ ID Required

NOTE: You might want to being your own wine glass as I think they charge a few bucks to buy a wine glass. Trust me you do not want to drink these great wines out of a plastic cup! Plus they tend to pour you less if you do!

If you park on ther street do not forget to feed the meter! Gorden has a parking lot but itÂ  fills quickly.

PLEASE NOT: I posted a Pre Wine tasting Lunch at the Mad Raven (Close + walkable to Wine Tasting). This will be the best way to get to meet and chat to your fellow members. Also, the best way to find us too. As the wine tasting will get packed!

Click here to RSVP for that lunch: http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/80932092/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Biagio at 12:45PM in the back classroom/cooking room so we can find each other! Do NOT come late you will miss the group!
item.name: GRAND WINE TASTING at Gordon's Fine Wine in Waltham, MA --It is the BEST!
